title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

Each criterion is achieved independently.
descriptions: Response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.

Response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question. NOTE: To meet the minimum requirement of “describe,” the response must do more than simply mention an isolated term. It is not necessary to offer a lengthy description, but the response must go beyond mere name-dropping by offering at least some relevant detail.

Response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question. NOTE: To meet the minimum requirement of “describe,” the response must do more than simply mention an isolated term. It is not necessary to offer a lengthy description, but the response must go beyond mere name-dropping by offering at least some relevant detail.

Response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question. NOTE: To meet the minimum requirement of “describe,” the response must do more than simply mention an isolated term. It is not necessary to offer a lengthy description, but the response must go beyond mere name-dropping by offering at least some relevant detail.
